description: Detects suspicious process patterns found in logs when CrackMapExec is used
name: CrackMapExec Process Patterns
query: ((process.command_line:*cmd.exe\ \/c\ * AND process.command_line:*tasklist\ \/fi\ * AND process.command_line:*Imagename\ eq\ lsass.exe* AND user.name:(*NT\ AUTHO* OR *NT\ AUTO*)) OR (process.command_line:*do\ rundll32.exe\ C\:\\windows\\System32\\comsvcs.dll,\ MiniDump* AND process.command_line:*\\Windows\\Temp\\* AND process.command_line:*\ full* AND process.command_line:*%%B*) OR (process.command_line:*tasklist\ \/v\ \/fo\ csv* AND process.command_line:*findstr\ \/i\ \"lsass\"*))
author: Florian Roth
